tit.cmt: 「Kaninnomiya Imperial Prince Naruhito」 ⇒ 『Imperial Prince Kanin-no-miya Naruhito』に変更しました。他の親王英語表記と統一させるためです。

sen.j: 閑院宮愛仁親王（かんいんのみや なるひとしんのう、文化 (元号)15年1月13日 (旧暦)（1818年2月17日） - 天保13年9月17日 (旧暦)（1842年10月20日））は、江戸時代の皇族。
sen.e: Kaninnomiya Imperial Prince Naruhito (February 17, 1818 – October 20, 1842) was a member of the Imperial family in the Edo period.
Imperial Prince Kanin-no-miya Naruhito (February 17, 1818 – October 20, 1842) was a member of the Imperial family who lived in the Edo period.
sen.cmt: ・「Kaninnomiya Imperial Prince Naruhito」 ⇒ 『Imperial Prince Kanin-no-miya Naruhito』に変更しました。・「the Imperial family in the Edo period」 ⇒ 『the Imperial family who lived in the Edo period』に修正しました。
sen.e: Imperial Prince Kanin-no-miya Naruhito (February 17, 1818 – October 20, 1842) was a member of the Imperial family who lived in the Edo period.
He was the fifth family head of the Kanin no Miya family.
He was the fifth family head of the Kanin-no-miya family.
sen.cmt: 「the Kanin no Miya family」 ⇒ 『the Kanin-no-miya family』に変更しました。
sen.e: He was the fifth family head of the Kanin-no-miya family.
His father was Kaninnomiya Imperial Prince Tatsuhito.
His father was Imperial Prince Kanin-no-miya Tatsuhito.
sen.cmt: 「Kaninnomiya Imperial Prince Tatsuhito」 ⇒ 『Imperial Prince Kanin-no-miya Tatsuhito』に変更しました。
sen.e: His father was Imperial Prince Kanin-no-miya Tatsuhito.

sen.j: 文政11年（1828年）に親王宣下、元服。
sen.e: In 1828, he was given the title of Imperial Prince and celebrated his coming of age.
In 1828, he was given the title of Imperial Prince and celebrated his coming of age.
In 1828, he was given the title of Imperial Prince and celebrated his coming of age.

sen.j: 愛仁親王には、嗣子がなかったため、明治時代に入って伏見宮邦家親王第16王子の閑院宮載仁親王が、継承した。
sen.e: As Imperial Prince Naruhito had no heirs, Kaninnomiya Imperial Prince Kotohito, the 16th imperial prince of the Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Kuniie, succeeded to the family in the Meiji period.
As Imperial Prince Naruhito had no heirs, Imperial Prince Kanin-no-miya Kotohito, the 16th son of Imperial Prince Fushimi-no-miya Kuniie, succeeded to the family in the Meiji period.
sen.cmt: ・「Kaninnomiya Imperial Prince Kotohito」 ⇒ 『Imperial Prince Kanin-no-miya Kotohito』に変更しました。・「the 16th imperial prince」 ⇒ 『the 16th son』に変更しました。・「the Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Kuniie」 ⇒ 『Imperial Prince Fushimi-no-miya Kuniie』に変更しました。
sen.e: As Imperial Prince Naruhito had no heirs, Imperial Prince Kanin-no-miya Kotohito, the 16th son of Imperial Prince Fushimi-no-miya Kuniie, succeeded to the family in the Meiji period.

sen.j: また、愛仁親王没後は、閑院宮孝仁親王妃が当主格に遇された。
sen.e: After the death of Imperial Prince Naruhito, the wife of Imperial Prince Tatsuhito was treated as the family head.
After the death of Imperial Prince Naruhito, the wife of Imperial Prince Tatsuhito was treated as the family head.
After the death of Imperial Prince Naruhito, the wife of Imperial Prince Tatsuhito was treated as the family head.
